scenario.name: Hold Resume
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 From: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 22 Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Allow: INVITE,CANCEL,BYE,ACK,INFO,REFER,UPDATE,OPTIONS,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,PRACK Supported: replaces User-Agent:Avaya A175 Collaboration Tablet Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] [len]
v=0 o=sip:[field0]@[local_ip] 1 23 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=sip:[field0]@[local_ip] c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 119 b=AS:64 a=rtpmap:0 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:119 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:119 0-15 a=sendrecv

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [routes] Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: Avaya A175 Collaboration Tablet Content-Length: 0
BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 [last_From:] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [routes] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
